products.title: Bright Red (4159)

products.productdescription:
A simple, stylish way to soften incoming light and achieve basic privacy.

 	Diffuses sunlight
 	Provides privacy
 	Installs in minutes

products.title: Flash Red (4572) (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Flash Red (4572) (Blackout) Velux Blackout Roller Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Blackout Roller Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.

products.title: Classic Red (1269)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Classic Red (1269) Velux Pleated Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Pleated Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The Velux pleated blind is an elegant way to provide privacy while bathing your room in a pleasant , soft light. It can be positioned anywhere in the roof window to adjust the amount of incoming light an you can still enjoy a view of he outside.

 	Softly diffuses incoming daylight.
 	Elegant, decorative lighting effect.
 	Flexible and stepless positioning.
 	Slim, elegant side rails and top case.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	20 different colours and designs.

products.title: Passionate Red (7060)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Passionate Red (7060) Velux Venetian Blinds from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Venetian Blinds online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
Low maintenance, moisture resistant Venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment.

 	Perfect for high humidity rooms.
 	Easy to clean.
 	Optimum light adjustment.
 	Preserves your view whole providing privacy.
 	No hanging cords.
 	Installs in minutes.
 	9 colour choices.

products.title: Skye Lava Red (Blackout)
products.metadescription: Buy made to measure Skye Lava Red (Blackout) Velux Windows 2014 Onwards from SoEasy Blinds. Order quality Velux Windows 2014 Onwards online today at low prices with fast UK delivery
products.productdescription:
The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window.  Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit Velux, Rooflite, Keylite, Fakro and Dakstra roof windows.  Offering optimum light control each blind can be positioned effortlessly to sit at any desired point within the side channels.

All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
